# <a name="turn-off-focused-inbox"></a><span data-ttu-id="0c6ca-102">Desactivar la bandeja de entrada prioritarios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0c6ca-102">Turn off Focused Inbox</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="0c6ca-103">En la parte superior de la página, selecciona el icono de engranaje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0c6ca-103">At the top of the page, select the gear icon</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="0c6ca-104">para abrir el panel de configuración.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0c6ca-104">to open the Settings pane.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="0c6ca-105">En el panel Configuración, mueva la **bandeja de entrada prioritarios** a desactivada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0c6ca-105">In the Settings pane, move the **Focused Inbox** toggle to off.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0c6ca-106">Para obtener más información, consulte [desactivar la bandeja de entrada prioritarios](https://support.office.com/article/f714d94d-9e63-4217-9ccb-6cb2986aa1b2#bkmk_outlookonweb).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0c6ca-106">For more information, see [Turn off Focused Inbox](https://support.office.com/article/f714d94d-9e63-4217-9ccb-6cb2986aa1b2#bkmk_outlookonweb).</span></span>
